name: Devworks Bootcamp
description: Devworks is a full stack JavaScript Bootcamp located in the heart of Boston that focuses on the technologies you need to get a high paying job as a web developer

name: ModernTech Bootcamp
description: ModernTech has one goal, and that is to make you a rockstar developer and/or designer with a six figure salary. We teach both development and UI/UX

name: Codemasters
description: Is coding your passion? Codemasters will give you the skills and the tools to become the best developer possible. We specialize in full stack web development and data science

name: Devcentral Bootcamp
description: Is coding your passion? Codemasters will give you the skills and the tools to become the best developer possible. We specialize in front end and full stack web development

name: .NET Mastery
description: .NET Mastery Bootcamp focuses on mastering the .NET ecosystem, including C#, ASP.NET, and related technologies, preparing you for a career in enterprise-level web development.

name: Just Web Dev
description: Just Web Dev is a cutting-edge bootcamp offering immersive courses in web development, with a focus on creative front-end design, full-stack engineering, and interactive web technologies.

name: Hardcore JavaScript
description: Hardcore JavaScript is an intensive bootcamp designed for developers who want to master JavaScript in all its forms, from front-end frameworks like React and Vue to back-end with Node.js and advanced full-stack development.

name: DevOps Mastery with AKS
description: DevOps Mastery with AKS is a specialized bootcamp focused on equipping you with the skills to manage and deploy containerized applications using Kubernetes on Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS). Learn CI/CD pipelines, automation, and best practices for DevOps.

name: Azure OpenAI Bootcamp Basic
description: The Azure OpenAI Bootcamp is designed to teach you how to harness the power of artificial intelligence using Microsoft’s Azure OpenAI services. Learn how to build and integrate AI models, natural language processing, and machine learning into real-world applications.

name: Azure OpenAI Bootcamp Advance
description: The Azure OpenAI Bootcamp is designed to teach you how to harness the power of artificial intelligence using Microsoft’s Azure OpenAI services. Learn how to build and integrate AI models, natural language processing, and machine learning into real-world applications.

name: Cyber Security Academy
description: Become a cybersecurity expert with our comprehensive bootcamp. Learn critical penetration testing, ethical hacking, and network defense skills to protect organizations from cyber threats.

name: Data Science Immersive
description: Master the art of data science with this intensive bootcamp. Learn data wrangling, analysis, visualization, machine learning, and deep learning using Python and popular libraries.

name: Product Management Intensive
description: Upskill yourself for a product management career with this comprehensive bootcamp. Learn product strategy, user experience (UX) design, Agile methodologies, and how to bring innovative products to market.

name: Blockchain Development Bootcamp
description: Dive into the world of blockchain technology with this in-depth bootcamp. Learn about distributed ledger systems, smart contracts, and how to build decentralized applications (dApps).

name: UX/UI Design for Beginners
description: This beginner-friendly bootcamp is your gateway to the exciting world of UX/UI design. Learn the fundamentals of user interface (UI) and user experience (UX) design, design thinking, and prototyping tools.

name: Blockchain Development Bootcamp
description: Dive into the world of blockchain technology with this in-depth bootcamp. Learn about distributed ledger systems, smart contracts, and how to build decentralized applications (dApps).

name: Full Stack Web Development Bootcamp
description: Master the front-end and back-end of web development in this comprehensive bootcamp. Learn HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, and more to build modern web applications.

name: Data Science Bootcamp
description: Become a data scientist with this intensive bootcamp. Learn Python, data analysis tools, machine learning algorithms, and more to extract insights from data.

name: Cybersecurity Bootcamp
description: Learn the skills to protect networks and systems from cyberattacks in this cybersecurity bootcamp. Gain hands-on experience with penetration testing, incident response, and more.

name: Digital Marketing Bootcamp
description: Master the art and science of digital marketing in this bootcamp. Learn SEO, SEM, social media marketing, email marketing, and more to drive traffic and conversions.

name: UX/UI Design Bootcamp
description: Design beautiful and user-friendly interfaces with this UX/UI design bootcamp. Learn design principles, tools like Figma and Adobe XD, and user research techniques.

name: Software Engineering Bootcamp
description: Build a strong foundation in software engineering with this comprehensive bootcamp. Learn programming languages like Java, Python, and C++, data structures, algorithms, and software development methodologies.

name: Artificial Intelligence Bootcamp
description: Explore the world of AI and machine learning with this bootcamp. Learn Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch, and other tools to build intelligent systems.

name: Product Management Bootcamp
description: Learn the art and science of product management in this bootcamp. Discover how to define product strategy, conduct market research, and manage product development cycles.

name: Game Development Bootcamp
description: Create your own games with this game development bootcamp. Learn game engines like Unity and Unreal Engine, game design principles, and programming for game development.

name: Graphic Design Bootcamp
description: Master the art of visual communication with this graphic design bootcamp. Learn design principles, typography, software like Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator, and how to create impactful visuals.

name: 3D Animation Bootcamp
description: Bring your characters and stories to life with this 3D animation bootcamp. Learn software like Maya and Blender, 3D modeling, animation principles, and character rigging.

name: Digital Photography Bootcamp
description: Capture stunning photographs with this digital photography bootcamp. Learn camera settings, lighting principles, composition techniques, and post-processing software like Adobe Lightroom.

name: Music Production Bootcamp
description: Create professional-sounding music with this music production bootcamp. Learn DAW software like Ableton Live and Logic Pro, music theory, sound design, and mixing techniques.
